All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AccountService
Service that manages login and register
AccountSettingsController
Class for the account settings.
API
Handles communication with the TMDB API for media data.
App
Startpoint of the application
AppState
Class to establish a state of the app whether it be user, or media
CreateAccountController
Class to create user account.
DatabaseConnection
Manages the connection to the application's SQLite database.
HomeDiscoverController
Class to retrieve home page.
HttpRequest
Handles the direct HTTP request to the TMDB API.
LoginController
Function to log users in.
Media
Standard structure for all items retrieved from the TMDB API
MediaDetailsController
Class to retrieve media details page.
MediaFactory
 
Movie
Unused class intended to serve as a subclass to the Media class with Movie-specific attributes
MovieCardController
Function to retrieve interactive media cards
Person
Person class abstraction used for cast members
PrivacyDataController
Establishes the privacy policy of the application
SceneManager
 
SearchController
 
SearchService
Service that manages search page
SettingsController
Class to control the settings based off each user.
TermsAndConditionsController
Establishes the terms and conditions of the app
TVSeries
Unused class intended to serve as a subclass to the Media class with TV-specific attributes
UserSession
Defines the session for the user so they can have unique attributes such as watchlist
